snippet: Backup catcher Mike Nickeas’s double led to Jordany Valdespin’s first major league hit, a three-run homer in the ninth that sent the Mets to their third straight win.
abstract: New York Mets defeat Philadelphia Phillies, 5-2; Mets backup shortstop Jordany Valdespin gets his first major league hit, a three-run homer in the ninth to send the Mets to their third straight win.
lead_paragraph: Backup catcher Mike Nickeas’s double led to Jordany Valdespin’s first major league hit, a three-run homer in the ninth that sent the Mets to their third straight win.

headline.seo: Jordany Valdespin’s First Career Hit Leads Mets Past Phillies
headline.main: A Met’s First Career Hit Is a Big One in the Ninth
headline.print_headline: A Met’s First Career Hit Is a Big One in the Ninth
